rules.natural: Provided that a team conducts a field survey in a natural place, the team collects specimens of an animal.
Whenever a team collects specimens of an animal, then if a study is not published, a government enacts a policy change.
Should locals possess traditional knowledge, conservation success in a natural place follows.
Either locals have traditional knowledge or researchers provide scientific evidence.
Given that a principal investigator submits a research proposal, a team conducts a literature review.
On the condition that a principal investigator submits a research proposal, a team addresses research ethics.
Either a principal investigator submits a research proposal or a team executes a pilot study.
Provided that a team executes a pilot study, then if researchers provide scientific evidence, conservation success in a natural place is achieved.

If a study undergoes peer review, then whenever a principal investigator submits a research proposal, then in the event that researchers provide scientific evidence, conservation success in a natural place happens.
Either a committee raises ethical concerns or a study undergoes peer review.
In the event that a committee grants ethical approval, it is not the case that the committee raises ethical concerns.
Either a grant agency issues a funding rejection or a committee grants ethical approval.

If a researcher formulates an initial hypothesis, then provided that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug) implies a drug was approved), a drug does not face a regulatory hurdle.
Either a researcher formulates an initial hypothesis or a researcher proposes an alternative hypothesis.

If a team conducts hypothesis testing, then whenever a researcher proposes an alternative hypothesis, then provided that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug) implies a drug was approved), a drug does not face a regulatory hurdle.
Either a team conducts hypothesis testing or a team designs an experiment.

Provided that a team designs an experiment, then if a researcher proposes an alternative hypothesis, then in the event that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug) implies a drug was approved), a drug does not face a regulatory hurdle.

Assuming a team performs an ecological assessment, then if a biodiversity survey is conducted in a natural place, then provided that conservation success in a natural place does not occur, an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug.
In cases where an animal exhibits medicinal properties, an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug.
If a team reports preliminary findings, then whenever samples are subjected to biochemical analysis, an animal exhibits medicinal properties.
Either a team reports preliminary findings or a team carries out a confirmatory study.
Should a drug be tested, a drug is approved.

If data undergoes statistical analysis, then assuming a team carries out a confirmatory study, then in the event that samples are subjected to biochemical analysis, an animal exhibits medicinal properties.
Either a natural place experiences habitat destruction or either a natural place has its habitat preserved or conservation success in a natural place occurs.
Either an organization engages in conservation effort or a team undertakes a restoration project.
Provided that a team undertakes a restoration project, a natural place does not experience habitat destruction.
If a team conducts an environmental assessment, then whenever an organization engages in conservation effort, a natural place does not experience habitat destruction.
Either a team conducts an environmental assessment or a team performs an impact study.
Should a team perform an impact study, then if an organization engages in conservation effort, a natural place does not experience habitat destruction.
Given that a manuscript is submitted to a journal, a study is published as research.
In cases where a researcher gives a conference presentation, a study is published as research.

If a grant provides research funding, then provided that it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug), a drug is tested.
Either a grant provides research funding or a team conducts a field expedition.
Whenever an animal experiences species decline, a natural place suffers habitat loss.
If a process involves data validation, it is not the case that the process ensures data integrity.
Either a process involves data validation or a study undergoes peer review.
Given that a team conducts a literature review, a team performs a meta-analysis.
Provided that a team performs a meta-analysis, a team executes a systematic review.
Whenever a team conducts a field expedition, samples undergo lab analysis.
Should a team execute a systematic review, then if researchers provide scientific evidence, conservation success in a natural place is achieved.
In cases where a team develops an experimental protocol, then provided that researchers provide scientific evidence, conservation success in a natural place happens.
Assuming a team addresses research ethics, a team develops an experimental protocol.

If samples undergo lab analysis, then in the event that it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug), a drug is tested.
Provided that a study is published as research, either a natural place has its habitat preserved or conservation success in a natural place occurs.
If it is not the case that either a manuscript is submitted to a journal or a researcher gives a conference presentation, a project encounters a research delay.
Should it not be the case that either an expert approves the methodology or if an expert reviews the methodology, a study undergoes peer review, an expert rejects the methodology.

In the event that it is not the case that either an expert approves the methodology or if an expert reviews the methodology, a study undergoes peer review, it is not the case that an expert rejects the methodology.
Provided that it is not the case that if a process involves data validation, the process ensures data integrity, the process reveals a data anomaly.
Assuming it is not the case that either a natural place has its habitat preserved or conservation success in a natural place occurs, an animal experiences species decline.

Should it not be the case that (if it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug) implies a drug was approved), a drug faces a regulatory hurdle.
Whenever it is not the case that (if conservation success in a natural place does not occur, then an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug), a drug is not approved.
Should a study not be published as research, it is not the case that a government implements a policy change.
Assuming conservation success in a natural place does not occur, samples are subjected to biochemical analysis.
Whenever conservation success in a natural place does not occur, it is not the case that an animal was discovered to be a source of a drug.
